General.Name: Fosterville South Exploration Ltd
General.Description: Fosterville South Exploration Ltd., a junior exploration company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of epizonal orogenic gold deposits in Australia. The Company's principal properties are the 100% owned Lauriston Gold Project covering an area of 215 km2; Golden Mountain Project, which covers an area of 102 km2; Moormbool Project comprising three granted licenses; and Providence Project that covers an area of 650 km2. Fosterville South Exploration Ltd. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1190 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7
